website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you want cold-pressed castor oil in a 16-ounce bottle, but don't expect much from the sub-par pump that comes with it.
pros: An ample 16-ounce bottle of pure, cold-pressed castor oil that's triple refined for added purity
Customers love how well it moisturizes skin
Backed by a satisfaction guarantee from the manufacturer
cons: Bottle includes a pump that is flimsy and prone to malfunctioning

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: Ok Ladies and Gents, I purchased this product back on March 22, 2018. Not so much for eyelashes (good for that too), but for my hair. Every time I wash and condition, I use it as a leave-in while in its natural coiled state. I have noticed that the hair is growing in thicker. I am on my second bottle. About to order another bottle soon. I also use it on my face at night especially under and around my eyes as a moisturizer. I hope Amazon never runs out.
customer_reviews.author: SDHR

customer_reviews.title: Does work if you use it consistently
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly this does work to regrow eyelashes! They've become thicker and missing eyelashes began to grow within a week of using it every night and sometimes during the day too.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Where have you been all my life?? And why did I not know about you. I thought castor oil was something school nurses gave children back in the 1950's. Never did I realize I'd love it more than coconut oil. I've been using it for two weeks, on my lips, eyelashes, brows, hands and thighs. My eyelashes have doubled in length (and I didn't have to spend $$$ in those growth serums), my brows are growing in and the skin on my thighs has tightened (translation; minimizing my cellulite 😉) It comes in a BIG pump bottle, such a great value. I wish I knew about this product a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: ArdenEden

customer_reviews.title: I love this castor oil This is my second time to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this castor oil This is my second time to purchase it from Amazon . My hair now hicker ,longer and softer I use it twice a week . And the bottle so huge . It last a long time and it had pleasant smell I recommended it . Because it is the best one I have tried
customer_reviews.author: Thakafi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry hair and skin
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I use it on my hair and it helps define my curls and avoid frizz. I use it on my face and all of my dry patches are gone! Comes with a pump top and a regular top, but the pump makes it so much easier when I'm doing my hair.
customer_reviews.author: meghandcarr

customer_reviews.title: Helping grow eyebrows back in thicker!
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows are growing back thicker and filling in. I was very skeptical about using castor oil on my face but now I love it. I am 40 so I was kinda like yeah, sure- this is going to help my eyebrows when some 20 something told me about it. But I figure what do I have to lose. I was shocked that some of the hairs that haven't been growing back for years started to grow back again! Trick is that you must do it constantly for weeks to see results but it works!
customer_reviews.author: DonnaReedOnCRACK

customer_reviews.title: No falsies for me!! All natural!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the oil for a week and can say that my eyelashes and eyebrows are definitely thicker!! I've had less fallout when taking off my eye makeup so I know they're stronger. I'll update my review in a few weeks with before and after pictures of eyebrows and eyelashes. I'm so excited for this product!!
customer_reviews.author: 3dragonflies

customer_reviews.title: ... it with some coconut oil and it is sooo amazing i saw results after the first use
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a mask for my hair mixing it with some coconut oil and it is sooo amazing i saw results after the first use, it calmed down the freeze and my hair shaft got thicker and looks really healthy i also apply it on my eyebrows and eyelashes before i go to bed and those are getting long too. I really love this product and so glad my friend recommended it. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: V Bouwhuis

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars ;)
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s been a week of using this and I see huge results; on day one I had like barely any eyebrows and eyelashes but a week later they’re thicker, darker , and starting to get hairy.. it definitely works, the eyelashes haven’t shown that much results but it just takes patience. Besides the eyebrows and eyelashes ; my skin is very smooth! (If you notice one is different than the other, I just took off my tails because they get in the way when I draw my eyebrows on)
customer_reviews.author: Emily Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a thick, wonderful feeling oil. I use it on my hair, eyebrows and eyelashes. After the first use I could tell I had used something good for my hair. It was soft, full, manageable and gets more so every time I use it. I also believe I see fuller eyelashes and eyebrows. It is not as messy as other oils I have used, since it is so thick. Love it, love the things it is doing for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby's nana

customer_reviews.title: Great grade of castor oil. Buyers may buy this with confidence
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Best of all I'm using it for all of its many uses. It's helped me quickly with an issue i had internally. Also what it's done for my hair is nothing short of amazing... my hair is shiny and the castor oil is speeding up it's growth.. no doubt in my mind...Without any bad side effects. Bravo to this seller for selling a good grade of this oil. The fact that its working effectively in many different ways means I can keep buying from you with confidence. Thank you Rachel
customer_reviews.author: Rachel.D

customer_reviews.title: Miracle oil that keeps promises.
customer_reviews.text: After a few applications on my lashes and brows, I instantly saw results. It sounds absurd and bias but with amazons generous return policy what do you have to lose? To some extent, not every product is for everyone. I gave my gal friend a to go container and she swears she is already seeing results. I put it on at night with an applicator brush and lightly massage in. It feels like syrup but it is not sticky, therefore it doesn’t run down your face. It’s stays exactly in place. It’s also completely odorless, so customization is a potentional factor. I am a new user to castor oil, and very excited to explore all its miracle like uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Phew stinky.
customer_reviews.text: Not a great smell compared to other products I've used. This castor oil has an odd odor to it. If I have to compare it, it smells like dog urine musk when you are trying to find out where your dog peed in the house. Will not be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthem DeVigil

customer_reviews.title: Makes it all softer.
customer_reviews.text: I used this stuff in my hair and it made my hair softer and less frizzy and grow more. So I was giving myself a hair cut, and I cut off my ear. Good thing I had some of this stuff left. I put it on the wound and the next morning a new ear started growing in that spot. But really, this castor oil makes my beard and stache soft and managable. I use it on my whole face and it makes my skin look younger too.
customer_reviews.author: bmanrabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great for rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because most of the reviews said it helps to regrow hair. While it didn’t help to regrow my eyelashes and eyebrows and thinning hair due to menopause it is an excellent nighttime moisturizer. I noticed that my dry flaky skin from rosacea is so much better and the inflammation is greatly decreased. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dana L

customer_reviews.title: Oily/acne face much better!
customer_reviews.text: I have defiantly seen a difference on my face after a couple weeks. I rub a small amount on my very oily/acne prone face before I go to bed. All around my face, the eye lids and eye lashes. My face seems to be less oily during the day, moisturized better, dark spots have dimished, eye lashes are thicker so I don't have to wear as much mascara, and I sleep better by rubbing a bit on my eye lids at night. Amazing stuff. I'm going to try it on my hair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel.w212

customer_reviews.title: ... hesitant on using this oil at first but I'm super glaD I did
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on using this oil at first but I'm super glaD I did! I gave it 30 days and definitely saw a difference with hair growth! The oil is thick, which I prefer and easy to use! I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: A great product with many uses!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on my thinning scalp, as well as a variety of blemishes and growths on my skin. The negative thing is that this is a very thick oil that doesn't go on smoothly, and it doesn't get absorbed quickly. But it works EXTREMELY well! I wish I had found out about this a long time ago. For large areas where I don't want to struggle to put it on, I find that mixing it with a little pure aloe and/or some virgin coconut oil helps a LOT.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Conditioned and hydrated hair and skin
customer_reviews.text: I use Aria Star castor oil every night on my skin, eye brows and eye lashes. I also use it on my hair and scalp. I’ve seen an increase in hydration on my skin and hair and my eyebrows and eyelashes are more conditioned and I’m seeing more growth. I’m very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Josefine P.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have taken a before pic
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical but figured it was worth a try. I am 42 and my eyebrows have been getting thinner the last few years. I have been faithfully putting this on for two and a half weeks. I have already seen results. I can't believe it!!! No liner necessary for the first time in years. I am so happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this oil is very nice. Not strong smelling
customer_reviews.text: Not having bought Castor Oil before I have nothing to compare it to. That being said, this oil is very nice. Not strong smelling. Very pure and feels good on the skin. Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: James T Maher

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: Works if used constantly to regrow hair. I've never had much hair where it counts. I've been struggling with my eyebrows since high school. This made them thicker. Because of how thick it is, I usually put it in my hair a few days before relaxing. I massage it in and let it sit. I put this on my eyebrows and lashes and could see the growth. Be warned: the hair grows back stronger so you may cry like I did when getting your eyebrows waxed after using this consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Audriel L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality oil for use on the skin, just take your time to rub it in because it is very thick, with a high viscosity. There is not much sent to it, but if you are worried about sent you can always mix in some lavender oil or another essential oil scent, a few drops at a time. I have tried using it on my hair but it is much too sick, so if you plan to put it in your hair I recommend getting another oil to mix with it, such as brahmi amla oil.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I am actually kind of sad I purchased such a big bottle
customer_reviews.text: I am actually kind of sad I purchased such a big bottle. The goal was to put it on my hair and skin but I couldn't get passed the weird smell so I stopped using it after a week. It just sits and accumulates dust in my closet now.
customer_reviews.author: I. marin

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair and skin!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the castor oil to help my eyelashes grow and to improve and prevent stretch marks in pregnancy. I am happy with the feel of the oil so far, since I have only used it a short time I cannot comment on its effectiveness but I did my research and found this is a great oil for hair and skin health. I love the pump for ear of use, especially as it allows me to pump just a small amount at a time and keeps the oil clean of contaminants.
customer_reviews.author: diana jungemann

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for scalp issues, psoriasis, eczema, dry scalp and itchy scalp. A Miracle work horse
customer_reviews.text: A miracle worker😇. This castor oil is a must for anyone with dry, itchy scalp and or medically diagnosed scalp dermatitis , eczema and psoriasis. It gets rid of those issues, your scalp is sore free, bump free, itch free and smooth and clean! Most importantly it makes your hair grow like wild flowers (thick and gorgeous), and doesn't smell, it almost is scent free unlike other castor oil brands I have tried that make your hair smell SOUR. No Scent. I massage daily on my scalp and hair. Luv Luv Luv and so will you😊😘
customer_reviews.author: BellaD

customer_reviews.title: To soon to tell!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this product long enough to make an accurate review. What I can say is this is a thick oil and a little goes a long way. I'm using it on my thinning hair line, and my eye brows. One to two small drops is all you need, because it covers the whole area. It doesn't really have a smell, but it is a bit sticky, so wash your hands well. I am confident that in several weeks I will be able to see results. I just apply the oil at night, that seems to work best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Girltalk

customer_reviews.title: It also doesn't make my hair super greasy like coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this for my hubbys beard but started adding some to my conditioner on a whim and Oh my goodness!! It has made my hair so soft and shiny and it knots up so much less than it use to. It also doesn't make my hair super greasy like coconut oil. Love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Sikes

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be mixed to be usable
customer_reviews.text: This works very well, but has the consistency of honey. Very hard to work through hair, and takes a good 3 washes to get it all out. It does work quite well. I’ve found it’s best paired with avocado, olive, or Rosehip oil as to not pull hair out while applying. I also add it to my sugar scrubs and it stays on the skin a lot better/penetrates deeper than olive oil (which is what I want). Sill needs to be mixed with other oils though.
customer_reviews.author: Zeb

customer_reviews.title: Also use on eyelashes and eyebrows and actually have noticed an increase in growth
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 3x so far. It makes my hair INCREDIBLY soft after washing it out. I apply a bunch to the front of my hairline, as that's where it seems my hair isn't as thick. I haven't noticed an improvement in texture or thickness (only used 3x), but it does make my hair amazingly soft after washing out. I leave it on about 15 mins before my shower, then I add my shampoo BEFORE* wetting my hair. This way it doesn't leave an oily residue. The scent is almost unnoticeable. So far I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have waited to review this purchase until I could really see if it worked for me and it does! It was well packaged, arrived on time. My eyebrows have filled in - no more blank spots or sparse areas! As a plus, my eyelashes are getting a little thicker and longer! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MimiSue

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using Caster Oil, but I really love it. I am using it in my hair, brows and face! It is pretty thick so I am now adding a little coconut oil to make it a little more user friendly. in my hair. I really like how it makes my hair feel once I've shampooed it out (it's too early to know if it is contributing to hair growth). I apply it to my brows and eyelash line at bedtime. It is a super product. Wish I had known about it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Polli C. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff! GROW!!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like my eyebrows & lashes grow over night! Love this stuff, the smell isnt harsh & doesnt burn eyes & great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great for eyebrows!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this to apply to my eyebrows for hair growth. I've been using it for a month and a half and I've seen results! Generously apply it with a q-tip before bed every night and in about a month, you should have fuller eyebrows! 16 fl oz is more than I need if I'm only using it for what I've mentioned, but this brand is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Zagorski

customer_reviews.title: Customer service on point!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great. I’ve used it for roughly a week in my skin and i can start to see a difference. Dark circles are getting better. Skin softer. The smell is not great but you get used to it and it is subtle. What was the best was their customer service. It came with no pump just a screw on top which was super inconvenient. I reached out and they sent out a new product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Though I’ve only been using this product a short time it is amazing helping with my hair growth I am a cancer survivor and I have lost all my hair your product has helped and just the short amount of time so I’m sure if I continue with it before you know it I’ll have a full head of hair again thank you for caring enough to follow up on how your product works it is greatly appreciate it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FOR EYELASHES AND DRY HANDS!
customer_reviews.text: Use on hands and eyelashes...My eyelashes became very thin and short after having my two daughters. I heard that Castor Oil could help with growth and loss of my eyelashes. I apply the castor oil to my eyelashes every night after removing my makeup. I have noticed a HUGE change! I have thicker, longer, and healthier eyelashes! I'm not dealing with eyelashes continuously falling out when I remove my eye makeup. Amazing! My hands are extremely dry, especially at night. This product is the only thing that keeps them from hurting at night. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my son's feet for a reaction he had to a sandal material. Within 24 hours, his skin had improved dramatically. I use this on my eyelashes, eyebrows, and under my eyes. I have also used it on my hands and legs for dry skin. Honestly, my skin has never felt better or looked better. It keeps my skin well moisturized and feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair thick and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my hair and I noticed that my hair has gotten thicker which I love! I rub it on my scalp a few hours before washing my hair and distribute it all over my hair as well. It’s good for thickening eyebrow hair and eyelashes as well, so don’t be shy to put it on there as well!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Changed My Skincare Regimen
customer_reviews.text: This product has to be the best skincare investment I have ever made. I chose this brand based on the high reviews, as with most of the products that i purchase on Amazon. I was not disappointed in the results. I use the castor oil on my natural hair after a co-wash and on my face when I oil cleanse at night. The results of improvement were instant. My hair is easier to manage and moisture for my ends when I twist and style my hair. My face is smoother and glowing. I will definitely be keeping this castor oil on stock as a staple for my skincare and hair regimens.
customer_reviews.author: baltimore wife

customer_reviews.title: The company has been awesome and has impressed me beyond belief
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the oil for about a week now...and am very impressed..I'm totally going to be ordering more and plan on ordering some for a couple of my friends as gifts, also for Christmas presents..The company has been awesome and has impressed me beyond belief! I'd order anything from the company that they offered simply because they are so nice and honestly CARE if I am happy with their product...I only hope they continue to be so considerate and kind to the customers..again..thanks!
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Oil is think like honey! No scent.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this oil a few days ago and I immediately put it on my eyelashes and eyebrows- I was excited to try. Today I was getting ready for work and noticed my eyebrows and eyelashes look so healthy. Really conditioned- but most importantly healthy!!! Hair deffinitely is growing for sure- this stuff is increidble. Also, I noticed a lot of reviews about the smell, but man idk what room of your house you’re in that has you smelling something weird, bc the first thing I did when I got it was to see if it smelled at all, and it’s really doesn’t smell like anything. It’s all natural so, idk ladies!! Mine is pretty scent less!
customer_reviews.author: Alison B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed oil
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed this time. The oil I ordered was not castor oil. I order this oil often and this time it’s not it. The smell is different as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Castor oil is my daily go-to.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using castor oil for years for my face, hair and skin. Aria Starr castor oil is one of the finest i've used. It will be my regular oil to buy. I recommend castor oil for almost everything. It is a great antibiotic substitute when RXs are not necessary. Aria Starr is certainly a "star" in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Rich, but no sticky. I use Aria Gold Castro Oil all over including in my hair, on my eye brows, elbows and sole of my feet. Great moisturizer for my skin and hair. I would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Monica T.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy brows and lashes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy! You get a huge bottle for your money. I only use a tiny drop on my brows ans lashes occasionally, so my bottle is almost full. It is gentle, moisturizing and leaves my brows and lashes shiny, healthy and full. I use waterproof mascara which can be drying but this replenishes moisture and prevents breakage. I highly recommend this product. The texture is slightly sticky and the smell is to be expected. It's not too heavy though, it fades after applying it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Norris

customer_reviews.title: No ideas How can castor oil can put on hair ???????
customer_reviews.text: I saw some videos and articles about Castor oil can make ppl hair growth fast and healthy so I bought this . I just tried to use it tn , and put some on my hair for 20 mins then I washed it . It was so much sticky , like putting lots of honey on hair , i tried really hard to rinse it out but I couldn’t , so I used a mint shampoo to wash my hair one more time. Eventually It was getting a little but better , at least I could comb some hair after washed !! Maybe using for skin ll be better than hair !!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger cat

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely a great quality product and value that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a great quality product and I couldn't be happier with the results. As a woman of color, I try to keep my edges, eyebrows, and everything else extra moisturized in the winter- and this works better than anything else I've ever tried. I use this on elbows, knees, fingertips, the nape of my neck, etc. It's definitely thick, and absorbs slowly, but I don't mind that, as I want it to last without having to reapply it throughout the day. Thanks again for such a great value and excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: DesertReal

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my father's skin!
customer_reviews.text: My father has frail skin and bruises easily. Normally his bruises take a long time to go away but when he rubs the oil on it daily after bathing, it heals a lot quicker. It's great because even though it's beneath the skin, it still heals and goes away quicker than without the oil. The castor oil absorbs into the skin and takes away his bruises in a few days whereas without it, it would almost seem to not go away at all. Great product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: RoxyP

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for me. In like 3 days of use my brow area got really flaky dry...i guess im allergic to it. I do have to say customer service is A+
customer_reviews.author: morie

customer_reviews.title: The best hands down love love love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness!! Ya'll this stuff is amazing❤👍 It has worked miracles for me not only my eyelashes but my HAIR!! I will buy this product till I pass it is the best I get complimented all the time and always refer them to Aria Starr :) There is ALOT I mean a lot it will last you even if you use it a lot like I do ( 5 out of 7 days ) you can't beat the price don't question this purchase it hasn't let me my family or friends down best out there 10/10 Aria Starr!
customer_reviews.author: aandc

customer_reviews.title: Try it out
customer_reviews.text: First this product came very nicely and securely packaged and with the option of regular bottle top, pop open top (idk correct terms) or the pump. It has a decent scent to it (castor oil generally isn't my favorite scent) Feels good on the skin (maybe tmi but it did resolve an unknown rash on my leg that no other cream helped). I can't speak to the growth potential yet, as I haven't had it long enough. Good size for the cost I think
customer_reviews.author: T_cruz16

customer_reviews.title: The BEST for oil cleansing
customer_reviews.text: This castor oil is a good value and even comes with a pump to make it easy to get out. Did you know that you can use Castor Oil to clean your face? Because you can! It takes off makeup, pulls gunk out of your pores. To oil cleanse just squirt some castor oil on and massage into your face for five minutes and wipe off. You'll notice that your pores are cleaner and your skin is soooo soft. I highly recommend this oil, it's amazing for the skin, and this is a good value and even comes with a pump!
customer_reviews.author: pikaomega

customer_reviews.title: Works well for hair and moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this castor oil in an attempt to seal my split ends. I started using it two-three times a week in my hair and I have really noticed a difference of how soft and shiny my hair is! I massage two-three pumps of castor oil in my roots and work into the tips and I leave it in my hair overnight then wash out in the morning. If you do this use a pillowcase you don't mind ruining because it will stain your case. After using it for a few weeks I also started using it as moisturizer and chapstick and it works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsieb

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. I use it with and without lotion
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I use it with and without lotion. Sometimes I add some almond oil. I use it on my face, legs, feet, arms, and hands. Family members use it to prevent hair loss, I use it to prevent eye lashes from dropping off so fast. It seems to be working! Seller is terrific! I received my order within a day and it was followed up by email asking how I like the oil and they reiterated their satisfaction guarantee. Nice touch! Would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Malucon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oil for moisturizing face and body
customer_reviews.text: Excellent oil for moisturizing face and body. I add a little bit to my body lotion, mix it together and apply it to my skin. It works really well to grow your eyelashes longer. I use a small thin eyeliner like brush to apply the castor oil along my lash line every night. Try it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hong

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for ME!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to put on my eyebrows and lashes in hopes that they would grow!! I have thyroid problems and that might be why it didn't work for me. I also have very thin blonde eyebrows and eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: vino_addict@yahoo.

customer_reviews.title: Great product see results already!!
customer_reviews.text: It has been 3 weeks I purchased this product I use it on my hair and marks on my skin, my hair is so soft and glossy before this my hair was dropping alot and thin now its glossy,soft and thick not even dropping either. My marks I have on my skin is fading away this oil is great will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and in great condition. Also came with a pump which I ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in great condition. Also came with a pump which I wasnt expecting so that was a pleasant suprise. I like that it is big so I can split it up into smaller batches for different usages (lashes, brows, scalp, scars ). Great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works on my eyelashes! Makes my skin soft.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my eyelashes and eyebrows for the last three weeks. When I put on mascara today, I noticed that my eye-lashes looked much fuller. They have always been long but getting very sparse with age. So it works when you give it time. Honestly wasn't even expecting results just yet and was pleasantly surprised. It does not smell or feel greasy to me. My skin is fresh and soft around my eyes every morning. I love that it comes in an easy pump.
customer_reviews.author: NatS

customer_reviews.title: Good for hair growth
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 50s and have thinning hair. i see a noticeable difference in volume since using castor oil once a week for the last 3 months. I no longer have thin spots and my hair seems thicker and healthier.
customer_reviews.author: P. Miles

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have tried the oil on my hair and am very pleased with how it has made it feel so soft and smooth. Also, used as a lotion on my skin and am also pleased with the outcome. My skin tends to be a little dry and this oil did the trick in giving my skin some sheen.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Smell is strong
customer_reviews.text: Smell is overpowering to my overly sensitive nose. It works great on mosquito bites. I purchased for over plucked brows. **UPDATE** Aria issued me a refund. They want their customers to be 100% satisfied. What a phenomenal company! I love their Argan oil. Karen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps dull the appearance of stretch marks.
customer_reviews.text: I rubbed this on my stretch marks, then wrapped that area with Saran Wrap and put a heating pad on top for 20 min for as many days as I could. Helps to improve the stretch marks after just one use. It obviously can't get rid of them, but helps them to look better
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil for really dry areas. Heavier than the others but I use it on my feet and hands which really dry out in the winter, use on eyelashes and brows and around the eyes to get rid of stubborn lines highlight my lashes when I don't want to use makeup and reduce buffiness around the eyes,
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Wait and See
customer_reviews.text: The product came packaged well, with 3 interchangeable ways to get out the oil. The consistency of the product was as claimed, silky, thick, but easy to apply. I have only been using it for a week on my eyelashes and eyebrows. At this point it is far too early to determine if it's working to grow and thicken these areas, but I will definitely continue to use the product as directed. The support and information that comes after purchasing the oil, has been very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi E.

customer_reviews.title: It's too thick to use on my face for my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's too thick to use on my face for my facial lines, it just feels too heavy and uncomfortable. My legs are really dry and usually when I apply a cream to them after I shower at night or in the morning, about 12 hours or so later they are really itchy and I have to apply it again. With this product I don't have to do that, it lasts a few hours longer. So I use it on my legs.
customer_reviews.author: MICK

customer_reviews.title: all other castor oils that we used dried out our hair and made it super hard but this is completely different and actually softens ...
customer_reviews.text: For castor oil I still can’t believe how soft it’s making me and my baby’s hair, all other castor oils that we used dried out our hair and made it super hard but this is completely different and actually softens your hair and moisturize it
customer_reviews.author: CocoJ

customer_reviews.title: Castor Oil
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the oil to see if It would help my eyebrow hair grow. It is a very large bottle for my needs. I have put it on my eyebrows every night. It is a very thick oil. There is no scent and I’m not sure yet about moisturizing. I tried it on my face and top of eyes, but I think it was giving me a little allergic reaction so I keep it on my eyebrows only. I will see if it helps the hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne C.

customer_reviews.title: My hair loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was experiencing some hair thinning. Maybe bc I always part my hair down the middle but it would get so itchy. I started using this stuff in my conditioner and during the week between shampoos. So far so good. It’s such a large bottle that it’s going to last for quite some time. It really helps me retain the moisture in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: B A

customer_reviews.title: My hair drinks this.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re sensitive to smells this might not be the very best, it doesn’t really bother me but it doesn’t smell super great. I love castor oil though. Great for many purposes and natures own moisturizer. I use this a couple times a week as a deep conditioner. I put it on for a few hours and then sit in a steamy shower for a few minutes before rinsing. It does wonders, ladies!
customer_reviews.author: TTV LovableJessica

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is gold!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is life changing! I ise it on my skin...elbows, feet, and rub on my stomach everynight. I have noticed softer more suppke skin and my nails and hair is growing again. This is my new brand and new go to. The scent is not at all heavy like other castor oils i have used. This stuff is gold!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Using on dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried the castor oil on my hair but I have very dry skin with some rough almost callus like spots. The castor is is dissolving the worst spot. In just 5 days I see the dry skin crumbling off. As stated in other reviews, it is extremely think and the smell is not too pleasant but it is doing what I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: cookbookgal

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this !!!! For so many years i have struggled with my eyebrows.! I over plucked them for so many years. I have used everything to tey and get my eyebrow hair to grow and nothing worked . I started using this 2 weeks agk every night and my eyebrows are growing in spots i havent seen hair for so long.! SO HAPPY!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I use it on my hair and it makes my hair incredibly soft, but at the same time stronger. I use to have a lot of breakage and flyaways, but this has helped with both issues. I use it on my eyelashes as well, and it has made them longer, and a little bit thicker. I have only been using it for a little over a month, but I'm very excited to see further results.
customer_reviews.author: C. Furner

customer_reviews.title: Helps thicken eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter after she over plucked her eyebrows. The too picture was taken at the end of May and the bottom about six weeks later in mid July. I see a great improvement in her eyebrows and they’re almost back to normal. Only thing is We’re not a fan of the smell but it’s not strong so that’s good
customer_reviews.author: Evy

customer_reviews.title: this brand made me itch
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what was different from the brand and had first and this brand, but for some reason it made me itch. the home health brand never had me itch. No matter how small the amount, there was always itch. A shame, this was expensive and I feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: nothingmuch

customer_reviews.title: So far, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for about 2 weeks and I pretty much use it everywhere. Shortly before purchasing this, I started using ProActive and my skin has cleared up better using the combination of both Castor Oil and ProActive (yes, 51 and still breaks out). I use it on my face, body, eyebrows, eyelashes, hair. I mix it in with my face and body lotions too. I think it's too soon to say it's doing anything for my hair or eyelashes but my face is clearer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I could not wait to get this castor oil, It's fresh and clean on my skin, I used it for the first time on my hair this morning and I really like how it feels on my scalp. Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Tamar

customer_reviews.title: Love this Castor Oil
customer_reviews.text: I remember my mom giving me castor oil for colds. Not a GOOD memory. I was so surprised to discover this brand's castor oil. I use it for my hair and skin. It's thick but not OILY. It rubs into my skin beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: black ink + paper

customer_reviews.title: Castaway
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three bottles of this product and was completely satisfied until I received the third bottle. The product smells so bad, I had to order a similar product from a different supplier. I am throwing this Castor Oil away. I almost gag when I use. The first two bottles did not smell. Yuk!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hair.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the oil, and Oh my gosh! It feels so good. I bought it because my hair is thinning (thanks old age). I typically like a thicker oil, which this is, unlike some of the other brands’ runny oil. I can’t say if it works or not because I’ve had it less than 3 hours, but I swear I heard my scalp cheer. Lol This oil has left my hair so shiny! I’m looking forward to great results.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Nothing mends my processed hair like this stuff. And I love using it to moisturize my body as well. Gives it a great youthful flow. The bottle is huge and will last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Okomo

customer_reviews.title: Super soft brows and fuller lashes, in a week!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't blended it with another oil for my hair yet, but have been using it for my eyelashes and brows. I had the strangest brow dandruff. But it's gone, and my brows are soft and my eyelashes are thicker and I notice less fallout. Used a bit of it straight for my hands and rough feet and its amazing. I dont notice a smell too much, so that's nice. I'm waiting on more of my orders to come in so I can fully use this in my beauty routine!
customer_reviews.author: TaNea Yager

customer_reviews.title: Best castor oil!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Whew, this oil is the TRUTH. I don't know if it's just me but it seems like my hair has grown tremendously over the past 2 months that I have used this or it's been able to retain the length that I have grown, but I do notice a HUGE change in the softness of my hair and growth/STRENGTH since using this oil. I HAVE SEMI THIN FINE TEXTURE HAIR SO I USE EVERY OTHER DAY AND IT DOES NOT WEIGH MY HAIR DOWN. I love the attachments that came with the bottle and the bottle size is an excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working gonna keep a close eye on what I need it for but I do notice more hair growth and leaves skin soft as well not five stars yet but if it continues to show growth will get the 5 starts
customer_reviews.author: Eedy1

customer_reviews.title: A Beauty Hack that works
customer_reviews.text: I was told that this would inhance my eyebrows which were getting very sparse. This is the reason I bought this castor oil. I use it everynight on my eyebrows and magically appears a nicer eyebrow.
customer_reviews.author: sheltylady

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot I can see a difference already ...
customer_reviews.text: Bn using it for a wk now. Like it a lot I can see a difference already in my skin (arms and face). Product itself is thick and barely any smell... Bottle is huge and practical ( pump).
customer_reviews.author: arelys diaz

customer_reviews.title: No matter your race, this oil will benefit you!
customer_reviews.text: My family is mixed with several races , and some were hesitant to use such a thick oil but this product does everything it's supposed to do! It helps moisturize your skin and helps your hair grow. I've been using this brand for over a year and it's awesome! It lasts a good while and the pump that comes with it makes it even easier to use! My only suggestion would be to start off with a small amount when using it to figure out how much you need because everyone's needs are different. So if you're looking for a natural healthy oil to help your hair grow and keep your skin smooth, buy this now!!!
customer_reviews.author: FoodMusicLove

customer_reviews.title: Great quality castor oil
customer_reviews.text: Great quality castor oil. I blend with a high quality olive oil to make a homemade "oil cleansing" face wash. I've been using this mixture of olive oil & castor oil for almost 3 years now with great results. Beautiful, soft, radiant skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for various things
customer_reviews.text: It is helping with the extreme dryness of my 5 year old - with has very dry skin - we put it on at night - with her pj's and socks and after one week - they have greatly improved - hopefully we have found what we need for her skin - thank you so much for this product - will be ordering another one - so that I don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I am enjoying using the pump on the bottle. It makes it easier to use. I use it to condition my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Judithjt3

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Kind of sticky no smell... I tried it on my hair a little drop but it was So damn sticky I couldnt leave it in very long at all...
customer_reviews.author: Destany

customer_reviews.title: just awesome
customer_reviews.text: i really love your product it has helped my hair ..put it in my eye brows seems to be doing good ..glad i got it and i am sure as i use it my hair and eyebrows well just get better..thank you for a great product ;)..i am trying different things ..i rub it on my nails at nite not alot ..they look great ..
customer_reviews.author: Terry A. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Fuller eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: No bad smell. It didn’t grow my eyebrows, but made them darker so they look fuller and I’m happy with that. Tried it on my eyelashes twice and the next day when I woke up my eyes hurt. It’s pretty thick so maybe shouldn’t be put on your eyes? (Obviously I didn’t do it again) I thought about trying it on my hair but I don’t think is thin enough to be washed off easily and I don’t want to go to the trouble of having to wash my hair too many times to get it off. Like other comments say it, the pump is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nourishes skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very dry these days; winter coming on; and of course menopause doesn't help! This oil is very thick and penetrates well; once it is rubbed in it appears to nourish my skin. A keratosis softened and fell off! Great stuff. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: metinthetrees

customer_reviews.title: Aria Star Beauty Castor Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have been interested in using castor oil on my hair I've read and heard good things about it. In my search, I found there are several types and brands. I went on Amazon to read the reviews and decided to purchase Aria Starr Castor Oil. I am transitioning from relaxed to natural, I had my hair braided for about 2 weeks and when I took them out my hair edges had thinned out, very disappointing I started putting castor oil on my edges at night and in the morning, and now my edges are growing back. I will continue to use to moisturize and hot oil treatments. Very satisfied and recommend wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Castor Oil on Hair and Skin
customer_reviews.text: On the skin: It's tacky, and I don't want that part of the skin touching clothing, to avoid oil spots. On the hair: This is the worst thing ever. It goes on thick. And I can't even comb my hair. My hair looks greasy and clumby. Had to wash my hair over again just to get it out. Will never use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Senora

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful oil for hair and skinl
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful oil for hair and skinl. I use it on my face at night. My skin is clear & moisturized. The Ricinoleic Acid in castor oil works to inhibit many viruses and bacteria, and as castor oil is able to penetrate skin tissue deeply, this makes it an effective treatment for acne. It is also an excellent healing aid for scars if used regularly. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The real Castor oil it really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it thus far...however I haven’t received the full benefit because it is to soon. I will review in about 30 to 60 days. Now I see the results in full force...my eye lashes are thicker and my brows are fuller. It took about 30 days and yes it works’
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

product_meta.title: Aria Starr Castor Oil Cold Pressed - 16 FL OZ - 100% Pure Hair Oil For Hair Growth, Face, Skin Moisturizer, Scalp, Thicker Eyebrows And Eyelashes
feature_bullets: PREMIUM GRADE: 100% Pure Cold Pressed Castor Oil. Hexane-Free Extraction. Only the best Castor seeds hand-picked and extracted by cold press to preserve the botanical actives and Triple Refined for the Highest Quality Grade. HUGE 16 ounce Bottle. Comes with a dispenser pump for easy application.

ALL-IN-ONE SKIN CARE: Get ready for your skin and face to instantly fall in love with your new blemish free and healthy looking supple skin. For your face, remove dirt, grime, make-up, and dry skin leaving your face delicious. Helps to fight acne, reduce acne scars, body moisturizer, no more terribly flaky dry legs, smooth skin, even skin tone, reduces pigmentation, minimizes fine lines and wrinkles, reduces dark circles & eye bags, fades stretch marks, and helps minor skin infections.

ULTIMATE HAIR CARE: Enjoy having young healthy gorgeous thicker hair once again. Your kinky curly hair will feel softer than it has ever been. No more breakage when detangled or manipulated. Say goodbye to your hair falling out, shedding terribly, tangling, ends dry and brittle, thinning, dry scalp and dandruff. No more clumps of hair on your brush. Say hello to thicker eyebrows and eyelashes.

ONE YEAR SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: When you ORDER NOW, know that you're protected by our ONE YEAR no questions asked money back satisfaction guarantee. If you're not 100% satisfied with any of our products, simply notify us, and we'll issue you a full refund. Your Satisfaction Is Our #1 Priority
